channel.title: Crash scripts preventing?
channel.description: i am asking this for tim-moughtin he is having trouble with people using speciel scripts to crash servers and sending everyone to log in screen and keeps server down. does anybody have something to detect these? or prevent them?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 12:39:52 PM[/size][hr][quote="tim_moughtin, post:1, topic:43939"]please tell me there is someway that no-ip or a script can detect a server crasher and ban him?[/quote]
